mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_cart(cart_id, member_id, book_id, book_count) VALUES (cart_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{book_id}, #{book_count})
mapper.select: SELECT a.cart_id, a.member_id, a.book_id, a.book_count, b.book_name, b.book_price, b.book_discount FROM book_cart a LEFT OUTER JOIN book_book b ON a.book_id = b.book_id WHERE member_id=#{member_id}
